text: “ ‘Sa’an nan na wuce na ga kina birgima cikin jininki, yayinda kike kwance can cikin jininki sai na ce miki, “Ki rayu!”16.6 Kaɗan cikin rubuce-rubucen Ibraniyanci, Seftuwajin, da kuma Siriyak; yawancin rubuce-rubucen Ibraniyanci na da “Ki rayu!” Kuma yayinda kike kwance cikin jininki na ce miki, “Ki rayu!”
